wikipedia_page.main: William David Mungo James Murray, 8th Earl of Mansfield, 7th Earl of Mansfield DL, JP (7 July 1930 – 21 October 2015), styled Lord Scone until 1970, was a British nobleman and Conservative politician.

response: *William Murray, 8th Earl of Mansfield, 85, Scottish nobleman and politician, appointed MEP (1973–1975).Earl of Mansfield dies peacefully at Logie House, Logiealmond. He was 85.

The Barony of Balvaird is one of several Scottish feudal Crown baronies. The previous Lord of Balvaird was Alexander Murray, 9th Earl of Mansfield. He had inherited the title from his father William Murray, 8th Earl of Mansfield, who died in 2015.Earl of Mansfield dies peacefully at Logie House, Logiealmond. He was 85., by Melanie Bonn, 23 October 2015, Daily Record. The title was purchased by the present Lord of Balvaird, Brady Brim-DeForest, in 2017.Registry of Scottish Nobility - Baronage Brim-DeForest owns both the castle of Balvaird and separately the titular feudal barony of Balvaird.
